about_the_game:
"Let's rock, baby!"

Dive into 73 tracks from the first title that set the third person action genre ablaze with smokin' sexy style. Featuring Dante From The Devil May Cry Series.

The 133+ minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).

content_descriptors.notes: The soundtrack contains some song titles that are sexually suggestive.
